description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Illustrations of the site and neighbourhood of the New Post Office. Comprehending antiquarian notices of St. Martin's-le-Grand and its Liberty ... With an appendix containing an account of the Antient Mourning Bush Tavern, Aldersgate, and various London taverns, its contemporaries. [By W. Herbert.]", "Appendix. History and Topography" Contributor: HERBERT, William - Librarian to the Corporation of the City of London Author: London Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS T.1299.(8.)", "British Library HMNTS 10350.de.11." Page: 9 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1830 Publisher: Smales & Tuck Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002250974 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
